meta.title: IN-FOMO | Professional Chatbot Development Services
meta.description: Transform your business with intelligent chatbots, AI assistants, and Telegram bots. Our professional development services create custom solutions to automate tasks and enhance customer engagement.

hero_description: We craft custom chatbots and AI-powered assistants that help businesses automate tasks, improve customer service, and boost engagement across all digital channels.
features_title: Why Choose Our Bot Development Services
features_description: We deliver comprehensive bot development solutions tailored to your specific business needs with a focus on innovation and performance.
feature_1_desc: Fully customized bots designed from the ground up to match your brand identity and specific business requirements.
feature_2_desc: Leverage the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to create smarter, more responsive bot interactions.
feature_3_desc: Deploy your bots across multiple platforms including websites, messaging apps, and social media channels.
feature_4_desc: Gain valuable insights into user interactions and behavior with comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.
feature_5_desc: Connect your bots with existing business systems like CRM, ERP, and other software for a unified workflow.
feature_6_desc: We provide continuous maintenance, updates, and support to ensure your bots perform optimally at all times.
bot_types_description: Our team specializes in developing a wide range of bot solutions to meet various business needs and use cases.
bot_type_1_desc: Automated assistants that handle customer inquiries, provide information, and resolve common issues.
bot_type_1_feature_2: Intelligent ticket routing to human agents
bot_type_2_desc: Advanced bots that leverage AI to provide personalized recommendations and intelligent responses.
bot_type_3_desc: Custom Telegram bots that extend your business capabilities within one of the world's most popular messaging platforms.
pricing_description: Transparent pricing options designed to accommodate businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprises.
price_1_desc: Complete development of a static bot with up to 100 blocks, including flowchart creation.
price_2_desc: Integration with one external system, including API study and technical specification development.
price_3_desc: API connections and database queries marked on the flowchart, priced per unit based on complexity.
price_4_desc: Implementation of translation module in each content block, unlimited number of languages supported.
price_5_desc: Custom design implementation for Viber keyboards (design development not included).
price_6_desc: Ready-to-use web component for e-commerce functionality within your bot.
additional_1_desc: Changes to content blocks after project delivery, charged per unit for more than 10 revisions.
additional_2_desc: Changes to integration blocks after project delivery, charged per unit.
additional_3_desc: Hourly rate for diagnosing and fixing issues not covered by warranty or subscription.
subscription_desc: Cloud hosting, access to admin dashboard with dialogs, broadcasts, and statistics. Includes platform technical support.
subscription_telegram: One Telegram or Viber bot account: $12/month
subscription_both: Both Telegram and Viber bot accounts: $20/month
cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Business with
cta_description: Contact our team today to discuss your bot development project and get a personalized quote based on your specific requirements.
